name: Phishing into Lateral Movement
description: A realistic phishing campaign targets finance and HR teams, escalates privileges, and exfiltrates PII by pivoting through a legacy file server.
entry_point: Spear-phishing with credential harvesting via a cloned HR portal
objectives: Access finance database and extract quarterly PII

stages.name: Initial Access
stages.description: Weaponized email impersonates HR, persuading a finance analyst to enter credentials into a fake SSO portal.
indicators: Suspicious login attempts flagged by email filters

stages.name: Privilege Escalation
stages.description: Using valid credentials and stolen tokens, a secondary workstation is compromised and credential dumping begins.

stages.name: Lateral Movement
stages.description: The adversary pivots through a vulnerable file server via SMB, moves to finance DB server, and activates a custom data collector.

stages.name: Exfiltration
stages.description: Data is packaged and uploaded via encrypted tunnel disguised as legitimate cloud backup traffic.

impact.technical: Compromise of finance systems and potential regulatory exposure
impact.business: Delayed quarterly reporting and reputational damage

detection_cues: Persistence of a new service account
Burst transfer activity outside of business hours
